title: Funeral prayer of HC Alauddin offered with full police honours
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 26 (APP): Islamabad Capital Territory (ICT) Police on Thursday offered the funeral prayer of Head Constable Alauddin at Police Lines Headquarters. The late officer was posted in the Security Division and had been diligently performing his duties.
An official told APP that Senior Superintendent of Police (SSP) Security Division Muhammad Sarfraz Virk laid a floral wreath, offered Fateha, and expressed heartfelt sympathy to the bereaved family.
He said the body was later sent to the officerâ€™s native town for burial with full official honours.
